content: add handmade charm to your fall décor with this beginner-friendly crochet pumpkin pattern perfect for complete beginners this pattern shows you step by step how to turn a simple crochet rectangle into a beautiful pumpkin with just one easy trick you ll learn two different methods giving you two pumpkin styles in one pattern > **free version of this pumpkin is available on our blog click here to view 1 ** this pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology no translations available at the moment ✨ pattern features beginner-friendly only basic stitches required step-by-step written instructions + photos two variations included 2-in-1 design customizable sizes make small medium or large pumpkins perfect for fall décor gifts markets and more materials needed worsted weight #4 yarn sample uses lion brand vanna s choice 5 mm crochet hook or size to match yarn tapestry needle & scissors fiberfill stuffing optional cinnamon stick twig or felt for stem versatile & fun stack your pumpkins for a festive centerpiece mix and match colors for farmhouse style or make minis for ornaments and gifts this pattern is quick relaxing and perfect for using up your yarn stash 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/the-easiest-two-in-one-pumpkin-pattern-in-6-sizes-free-pattern/
